description: Lists all of the IAM policy assignments, including the Amazon Resource Names (ARNs), for the IAM policies assigned to the specified user and group, or groups that the user belongs to.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the assignments.

nested_items.name: ActiveAssignments
nested_items.description: The active assignments for this user.

nested_items.name: AssignmentName
nested_items.description: A name for the IAM policy assignment.

nested_items.name: PolicyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
